reviews.comment: Loved the fresh ingredients in the tacos. The spicy salsa was a standout! Must remember to order extra next time.
The fettuccine Alfredo was creamy and perfect. Definitely a place to revisit for comfort food!
Good sushi, but the service was slow. Might not come back during peak hours.
BBQ ribs were amazing! Great vibe for a relaxed dinner with friends.
Best plant-based meal ever! The lentil burger blew me away. A new favorite.
Pizza was undercooked and bland. Not a place I want to revisit.
Great coffee and pastries! A perfect little spot for Sunday mornings.
Filet mignon was perfectly cooked. This place is a keeper for special occasions.
Decent burgers, but the fries were a letdown. Might try a different side next time.
Chocolate lava cake was heavenly! I need to come back for more sweets.
